ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T23:08:42 [Issue ID 4000-154286] urn:comicvine:4000-154286 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 19:02:17. [Issue ID 626971]
ComicInfo.Summary:
As Johann faces the fight of his life, Abe and Kate learn the story of Victorian occultist Martin Gilfryd's transformation into Memnan Saa, the prophesied king of Hyporborea who would 'tame fire to breed dragons.' Written by Mike Mignola and John Arcudi, and drawn by Guy Davis, B.P.R.D.: The Black Goddess follows The Warning as part two of a trilogy that pulls together threads from the beginning of the series-and leaving the B.P.R.D. and the world forever changed.
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/bprd-the-black-goddess-3/4000-154286/
ComicInfo.Teams: Frogs,Bureau for Paranormal Research and Defense
ComicInfo.Title: The Black Goddess [Chapter 3]
